Author.description: Basic information about a Moxfield user.
Author.title: Author

DeckBoard.description: A board (mainboard, sideboard, commanders, etc.) within a deck.
DeckBoard.title: DeckBoard

DeckCard.description: A single card entry within a board.
DeckCard.title: DeckCard

DeckDetail-Input.description: Full deck details including card breakdown.
DeckDetail-Input.title: DeckDetail

DeckDetail-Output.description: Full deck details including card breakdown.
DeckDetail-Output.title: DeckDetail

DeckSummary.description: Lightweight deck metadata that excludes card lists.
DeckSummary.title: DeckSummary

DeckTag.description: Tags assigned by the deck author to individual cards.
DeckTag.title: DeckTag

GameCreate.description: Payload accepted when recording a game result.
GameCreate.title: GameCreate

GameList.description: Collection wrapper returned when listing games.
GameList.title: GameList

GamePlayer.description: Player representation within a stored game.
GamePlayer.title: GamePlayer

GamePlayerInput.description: Player payload accepted when recording a game.
GamePlayerInput.title: GamePlayerInput

GamePlaygroup.description: Playgroup metadata embedded in a stored game.
GamePlaygroup.title: GamePlaygroup

GameRanking.description: Ranking entry within a stored game.
GameRanking.title: GameRanking

GameRankingInput.description: Ranking payload accepted when recording a game.
GameRankingInput.title: GameRankingInput

GameRecord.description: Stored representation of a game result.
GameRecord.title: GameRecord

MoxfieldDeckSelection.description: Deck selection metadata we persist per Google-authenticated user.
MoxfieldDeckSelection.title: MoxfieldDeckSelection

PlaygroupCreate.description: Payload used to create or upsert a playgroup.
PlaygroupCreate.title: PlaygroupCreate

PlaygroupList.description: Collection wrapper returned when listing playgroups.
PlaygroupList.title: PlaygroupList

PlaygroupReference.description: Reference to a playgroup when creating or serialising games.
PlaygroupReference.title: PlaygroupReference

PlaygroupSummary.description: Summary representation of a saved playgroup.
PlaygroupSummary.title: PlaygroupSummary

UserDeckSummariesResponse.description: Response for routes returning decks without card details.
UserDeckSummariesResponse.title: UserDeckSummariesResponse

UserDecksResponse.description: Main response payload for the /users/{username}/decks route.
UserDecksResponse.title: UserDecksResponse

UserProfile.description: Representation of a Google-authenticated EDH PodLog user.
UserProfile.title: UserProfile

UserProfileUpdate.description: Payload accepted when creating or updating a user profile.
UserProfileUpdate.title: UserProfileUpdate

UserSummary.description: Top-level user descriptor returned by the API.
UserSummary.title: UserSummary

info.description: Simple proxy API that fetches public Moxfield data.
info.title: Moxfield Scraping API

get.summary: Return cached deck summaries without calling Moxfield.
Return cached deck data without calling Moxfield.

get.description: Simple health endpoint for uptime checks.

put.summary: Create or update a Google-authenticated user profile.

get.summary: List recorded games for the authenticated user.

post.summary: Record a completed game for the authenticated user.

get.summary: List playgroups associated with the authenticated user.

post.summary: Create or update a playgroup for the authenticated user.

get.summary: Fetch a user's decks without card details.
Fetch a user's decks including full card details.

delete.summary: Delete a cached deck for a user.
